MESSAGE: My name is I.C.S.E.R  which stands for Interactive Cyber Security Educational Robot.
You will be asked a question, each question has 3 answers each answer is represented by a letter.
Type the letter that represents the answer you think fits.
You will hear this sound when you get a question.

STRING2: ? A- yes B- no C- I don't know.

MESSAGE: Opps! Did I get your name wrong? Sorry!

QUESTION: Is it safe to put personal information online? A- yes B- no C- I don't know.

MESSAGE: Good job! you know your stuff.
You should never put personal information online.

QUESTION: How long should passwords be? A- 1-5 characters B- 8-16 characters C- 99-1000 characters.

MESSAGE: Woah! Thats so long I guess it would be secure but could you remember that?

QUESTION: Whats the name of the cowboy in Toy Story?
Should you share passwords with your friends? A- yes B- no C- only the close ones

MESSAGE: You shouldn't share passwords with friends even the close ones.

QUESTION: Should you ignore suspicious people online? A- sometimes B- no C- yes.

MESSAGE: You should always ignore suspicious people.
Next Level! The questions get harder from here.
This was Tricky! The answer is phishing.

QUESTION: What does cyber-bullying mean? A- bullying online B- buying things online C- baking online.

MESSAGE: Cyber-bullying is bad and should never happen.

QUESTION: If a ad online says to click it and you will get a free prize, do you click it? A- yes I love free stuff B- only if I like the prize C- never.

MESSAGE: Never click on an ad like that its probably a scam.

QUESTION: Whats it called to pretend to be someone else? A- make believe B- pretending C- cat-fishing.

MESSAGE: You know how to stay safe online!
cat-fishing is bad, you should always be yourself.

QUESTION: Is it bad to hack? A-yes B- no C- only if you hack good people.

MESSAGE: You can be arrested for hacking.

QUESTION: What is a password? A- a fun name for your device B- a combination of characters to stop people getting into your personal info C- a useless time waster.
Is it important to stay safe online? A- yes B- no C- I don't know.

MESSAGE: It is very important to stay safe online
and I hope your learned about cyber safety.
